      Gets the file extension
      Parameters:
      fileName - the file name or path
      Returns:

      Parameters:

    • hasExtension

      public static boolean hasExtension​(java.lang.String fileName)
      Checks if the file or path has an extension
      Parameters:
      fileName - The file or path
      Returns:
      true if the file or path has an extension, false otherwise

    • transfer

      public static void transfer​(java.io.FileInputStream fis, java.io.FileOutputStream fos, long partLength, long[] bytesTransfered, boolean[] stop) throws java.io.IOException
      transfers data from an InputStream to an OutputStream
      Parameters:
      fis - The input stream
      fos - The output stream
      partLength - the length (in bytes) to transfer
      bytesTransfered - the bytes actually transfered (needed to calculate the percentage)
      stop - a stop flag that can be turned on from outside
      Throws:
      java.io.IOException - I/O error
